entry.title: Ukraine Awaits Word of Deaths, Survivors After Russia Hits Theater Turned Bomb Shelter
entry.content: Hundreds of Ukrainians had been hiding in the building amid fighting over the southern port city of Mariupol. A local politician said there were survivors.

entry.title: A Ukrainian Town Deals Russia One of the War's Most Decisive Routs
entry.content: In the two-day battle of Voznesensk, local volunteers and the military repelled the invaders, who fled leaving behind armor and dead soldiers. ‘They had no orders for what to do if they are defeated.’
